message: Just to elaborate, I have a printer connected to a PC and a Mac on my home network. What I would like to do is be able to print from my Mac to the printer attached to the PC. Any tips on how to do it would be appreciated. The PC runs W7 and the Mac, OSX Lion.

@TSJ you would need to set up "Network Sharing" on your PC.  Similar to that of sharing folders on a network you can share connected printers.  To work the PC must be on the network and be switched on.
Thanks, done! I didn't have sharing turned on. Doh... Thanks again.
